death.attack.if.ice_broken.player: %1$s gets smashed into pieces during a fight with %2$s.
death.attack.if.ice_broken: %1$s freezes and shatters into ice pieces.
death.attack.if.soul_knight_attack.playe: %1$s is engulfed by %2$s's soul fire and vanishes into ash.
death.attack.if.soul_knight_attack: %1$s's spirit is consumed and tormented by the flame.
death.attack.if.resistance_fire_ring.pla: %1$s attempts to breach %2$s's Ring of Fire Resistance but is incinerated instantly.
death.attack.if.chill_magic.player: %1$s gets frozen by %2$s's ice magic while flirting.
item.if.fire_brand.desc.1: An axe surrounded by flames, seeming out of this world.
item.if.flame_sword.desc.1: Hold right-click to unleash the [Blazing Wave Blade], raise Soultemp in same time.
item.if.flame_sword.desc.2: An powerful sword of balrog lord.
item.if.frozen_axe.desc.1: Hold right-click to unleash the [Clone Axe], remove Soultemp in same time.
item.if.life_lock.desc.1: Within ten seconds, another person must use the same Life Lock (only two can exist), otherwise, both will die immediately.
item.if.life_lock.desc.3: Bind the lives of both individuals. When one’s health percentage is lower than the other’s,
item.if.life_lock.desc.4: the other will receive a powerful healing effect. If either one dies, the other will also die.
item.if.rejuvenating_medicine.desc.1: If health is below 1 (about half a heart), restore full health,
item.if.rejuvenating_medicine.desc.2: and provide powerful absorption and strength effects; otherwise, die instantly.
item.if.hot_soul_furnace.desc.1: Hold right-click to consume durability and increase your Soultemp.
item.if.strengthen_hot_soul_furnace.desc: Hold right-click to consume durability and greatly increase your Soultemp.
item.if.cold_soul_furnace.desc.1: Hold right-click to consume durability and decrease your Soultemp.
item.if.strengthen_cold_soul_furnace.des: Hold right-click to consume durability and drastically decrease your Soultemp.
A furnace spewing biting cold winds.
item.if.soul_crystal.desc.1: Allowing continued access to the furnace's effects in other worlds.Someone really wants it.
item.if.soul_crystal.desc.2: A gem considered an extension of the furnace, effect range is 40 blocks.
item.if.magma_armor.desc.1: Raise Soultemp every sec and +30%% ATK when Soultemp in peak.
item.if.frozen_armor.desc.1: Remove Soultemp every sec and resist debuff effects of the cold.
item.if.aa_armor.desc.1: Doubles one potion effect on you every five minutes, lasting for one minute.
item.if.aa_armor.desc.2: The priority : Strength > Resistance > Speed > Absorption > Jump Boost.
item.if.guardian_armor.desc.1: Add 10 + 50%% armor strength when you pressed shift and ally is nearby you,
item.if.guardian_armor.desc.2: but decrease 20%% of your attack damage.
item.if.alchemical_pistol.desc.1: Randomly shoot the alchemy bullet and consumed the ingredients.
item.if.broken_alchemical_pistol.desc.1: Shoot the alchemy Bullet and consumed the ingredients.
item.if.potion.desc.1: Randomly get one permanent increase in Heakth/ ATK/ Speed. (No Stack)
item.if.magic_rod.desc.1: Binds to the first user upon use and can only be used by them thereafter.
item.if.magic_rod.desc.3: Hold right-click to chant. Upon completion, consume 20 EXP and cast the following magic:
item.if.magic_rod.desc.4: -When cast directly: Fires 3 consecutive [Frost Hunter's Spike] in front of you.
item.if.magic_rod.desc.5: -While holding Shift: summons [Ice Spears] beneath all enemies in 12 blocks of you.
item.if.magic_rod.desc.7: When not held but kept in the hotbar, the rod will fight autonomously :
item.if.magic_rod.desc.8: -Every 5 sec, it casts [Frost Hunter's Spike] to strike the nearest enemy to you.
item.if.magic_rod.desc.9: -When you hurt, a ring of [Ice Spears] instantly forms around you. CD: 30 seconds.
item.if.aa_jewelry.desc.1: Will randomly give the item on offhand a %s。
item.if.black_ice_shield.desc.1: The moment you raise the shield and successfully block an attack, the next attack will:
text.if.almost_frozen_1: So cold. I should warm up quickly.
text.if.hurry_break: Hurry! Break it! [Caution]: The BOSS break system works differently.
text.if.stuck_in_ground: Stuck in the Ground! Dig self out hurry!
text.if.soul_knight_summon_tips: Please keep all players stay in the ring and click it to start BOSS Battle.
text.if.soul_knight_summon_trigger_fail: Fail! All players should stay in the ring.
text.if.icy.spell.1.v0: %s: You insignificant worm, you will pay for your offense!
text.if.icy.spell.1.v1: %s: You filthy vermin who barged into my factory and wreaked havoc!
text.if.icy.spell.2.v0: %s: I will bring down the divine decree in the name of %s!
text.if.icy.spell.2.v1: %s: Now, let me show you who rules here!
text.if.icy.spell.3.v0: %s: The defiant will suffer severe punishment!
text.if.icy.spell.3.v1: %s: I, %s, decree this realm, respect my law.
text.if.icy.mantra.active: The mantra is now in effect
text.if.icy.mantra.v1.sub: No passage ahead, but perhaps you can walk backward.
text.if.icy.mantra.v2.sub: Run, for if you do, the curse won't catch you.
text.if.icy.mantra.v3.sub: Don’t jump, whatever you do, don’t jump.
text.if.punished.sub: The power of the mantra has temporarily left you
text.if.icy.mantra.react_on_you: You are once again under the power of the mantra
text.if.quick_click_shift: Quickly click shift to break free!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.1: %s: Foolish mortal, you cannot hurt me!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.3: %s: Is this what you call malice?
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.4: %s: I should deduct the pay of those guards.
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.6: %s: You think this will defeat me?
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.8: %s: Your fate will be the cultivation chamber!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.13: %s: You don't even know what kind of being you're facing!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk.17: %s: Stop! I can grant you endless riches!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk_soul_box.2: %s: Ahhh! Maggot, you will pay for your stupidity!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk_soul_box.6: %s: Let me show you what true hell is like!
text.if.icy.hurt_talk_soul_box.10: %s: Aaaahhh! No! I can't die yet! I....
text.if.soul_knight_portal.outside: Sure to transport into Flame Hell? (Boss Battle Field) %s
text.if.soul_knight_portal.inside: Sure to transport leave Flame Hell? (Boss Battle Field) %s
text.if.icy_portal.outside: Sure to transport ALL PLAYER into Dark Frozen Room? (Boss Battle Field) %s
text.if.icy_portal.inside: Sure to transport ALL PLAYER leave Dark Frozen Room?(Boss Battle Field) %s
advancement.if.enchantment.arrow_nocd.de: Make arrow won't being blocked by the hurt cooldown.
advancement.if.enchantment.cool_crossbow: Arrow will cause slowness, weakness and wither to the entity.
advancement.if.enchantment.flame_crossbo: Arrow will explode when hit entity.
advancement.if.welcom.name: %s%s Soulforge
advancement.if.mob.root.name: Monster Log
advancement.if.mob.root.description: Your notes on the mysterious beings living in this factory.
advancement.if.mob.boss_1.name: Erphalos' Wraith
advancement.if.mob.boss_1.description: The lingering soul of a hero who once came to slay the evil alchemist. Now fallen into delusion, he mindlessly strikes at all life with masterful swordsmanship. He chants powerful incantations—better interrupt him with heavy damage before they're unleashed.
advancement.if.mob.boss_2.name: Hubristic Alchemist - §k123544
advancement.if.mob.boss_2.description: An arrogant and malevolent alchemist rumored to have crafted a phylactery, achieving near-immortality. However, whispers say an accident occurred during the process, leaving the phylactery incomplete and bound to his vicinity. Perhaps by attacking him, you can locate it.
advancement.if.mob.blaze.name: Blaze
advancement.if.mob.blaze.description: A monster that parasitizes the Flame, once thought to be messengers of the fire god, they deliver the hottest blows to intruders.
advancement.if.mob.blizzar.name: Blizzar
advancement.if.mob.blizzar.description: A variant of the whirlwind messenger, its wind projectiles freeze into snowballs upon exposure to low temperatures. When shattered, they split into four ice pillars, making them even more deadly.
advancement.if.mob.aa.name: Alchemist Apprentice
advancement.if.mob.aa.description: A novice Alchemist serving the factory, just beginning to master Alchemy.
advancement.if.mob.aa.v1.name: Flame Alchemist
advancement.if.mob.aa.v1.description: A senior Alchemist in the factory, skilled in heating steel, a great companion for hot pot in winter. Specializes in summoning magma imps and using fire-resistant rings to repel enemies.
advancement.if.mob.aa.v2.name: Frozen Alchemist
advancement.if.mob.aa.v2.description: A senior Alchemist in the factory, provides cooling services for various parts in the factory and occasionally makes snow ice. Master of ice magic, capable of summoning rows of ice spikes and large ice blocks to repel enemies.
advancement.if.mob.aa.v3.name: Enchant Alchemist
advancement.if.mob.aa.v3.description: The top-tier Alchemist in the factory, rumored to bless machinery with better effects than obedient charms, though insiders reveal that the so-called blessing is just a glowing effect. Can enchant allies' equipment and occasionally cast debuff spells on enemies.
advancement.if.mob.cool_creeper.name: Unstable Frostborne Biohog
advancement.if.mob.cool_creeper.descript: An experiment gone wrong by an ice Alchemist attempting to create a pig that sprays scalding frost. The mutated pig contains massive violent ice power but cannot expel it, making it prone to exploding. The explosion generates frost winds that significantly slow down enemies.
advancement.if.mob.frozen_axe_skeleton.d: A low-level undead servant carrying a frozen axe, running around. Don't anger them, or you’ll experience what it’s like to be hit by an axe traveling at 100 km/h.
advancement.if.mob.frozen_zombie.name: Mournful Frozen
advancement.if.mob.frozen_zombie.descrip: An undead servant who worked in the frozen workshop, their body covered in a thick layer of ice, significantly enhancing their defense. The cold armor causes severe hypothermia upon contact.
advancement.if.mob.guardian.name: Guardian
advancement.if.mob.guardian.description: The lowest-level security personnel in the Alchemy factory, more numerous than the undead servants. Armed with an iron sword and a helmet, these are the best basic equipment. The captain claims that hitting the enemy 5 times will promote you to better equipment?
advancement.if.mob.guardian_archer.name: Arbalist
advancement.if.mob.guardian_archer.descr: Mid-level security personnel in the Alchemy factory, with noble long-range firepower. Few dare to anger them, especially those wielding Flame and Ice crossbows. Loading, aiming, shooting, falling, all so natural.
advancement.if.mob.guardian_shield.name: Shielder
advancement.if.mob.guardian_shield.descr: Mid-level security personnel in the Alchemy factory, their heavy iron shield provides extraordinary defense but slows them down. Don’t call me a lump of iron, that’s rude!
advancement.if.mob.guardian_spear.name: Lancer
advancement.if.mob.guardian_spear.descri: Mid-level security personnel in the Alchemy factory, wielding long spears, skilled at striking enemies with a sudden thrust, delivering a thunderous blow while closing the distance. It’s a spear, not a gun. How many times do I have to explain?
advancement.if.mob.guardian_hammer.name: Alchemy Blacksmith
advancement.if.mob.guardian_hammer.descr: Craftsmen in the Alchemy factory, responsible for all Alchemy tools. Perhaps due to too much pressure, they tend to immediately jump up and hit anyone who disturbs them.
advancement.if.mob.guardian_chef.name: Chef
advancement.if.mob.guardian_chef.descrip: The chef in the Alchemy factory, responsible for the entire factory's meals. Even crossbowmen dare not mess with them. Michelin five-star chef, everyone says the food is great, making them all energized and dealing extra damage.
advancement.if.mob.guardian_thief.name: Assassin
advancement.if.mob.guardian_thief.descri: The assassin in the Alchemy factory, specialized in eliminating political enemies of the Alchemists. Due to their kleptomania, they are not well-liked by colleagues. They often hide and, if they steal a good weapon, immediately jump out to strike their enemies.
advancement.if.mob.guardian_captain.name: Guardian Captain
advancement.if.mob.guardian_captain.desc: A high-level security officer in the Alchemy factory, responsible for coordinating all personnel matters. Even if they were just a low-ranking soldier a moment ago, with one order, they can become a high-ranking warrior.
advancement.if.mob.magma_lesser_demon.de: The lowest level of the fire demon, a mindless imp, bound by contract to the Alchemists and serving as a heat source for the steel furnace. They love throwing fire meteors at enemies. When they die, they explode, a final farewell fireworks show, according to the Alchemists.
advancement.if.mob.magma_demon.name: Balrog
advancement.if.mob.magma_demon.descripti: An ordinary fire demon, they enjoy staying in hot places. Contracted by the Alchemists to stay in the factory, working with molten iron. Upon death, they explode, known as a perfect one-for-one trade by the Alchemists.
advancement.if.mob.magma_demon_lord.name: Balrog Lord
advancement.if.mob.magma_demon_lord.desc: A high-ranking fire demon, surrounded by intense heat, contracted by the Alchemists to stay in the factory. They prevent the magma imps from causing trouble. They also enjoy throwing fire meteors, sometimes summoning imps for assistance. Upon death, they cause a large explosion, known as revenge world by the Alchemists.
advancement.if.mob.magma_cube.name: Magma Cube
advancement.if.mob.magma_cube.descriptio: A fun companion of the magma imp, squish it more, it multiplies, endless fun.
advancement.if.heat.root.name: Soultemp Status Log
advancement.if.heat.root.description: Your notes on the unique status of this factory.
advancement.if.heat.cremate_v0.name: Scorching Bind
advancement.if.heat.cremate_v0.descripti: Sustained health loss until death, with the rate of loss increasing as Soultemp rises, or when Soultemp is below 450.
advancement.if.heat.cremate_v1.name: Blazed Heart
advancement.if.heat.cremate_v1.descripti: Sustained health loss until death or Soultemp drops below a certain value, during which a high damage boost and speed increase are provided, with each attack restoring 4 health points.
advancement.if.heat.burning_v0.name: Burning
advancement.if.heat.burning_v0.descripti: Takes additional damage half a second after being hurt.
advancement.if.heat.burning_v1.name: Inferno Strike
advancement.if.heat.burning_v1.descripti: Sustained health loss until death or Soultemp drops below a certain value, providing high damage boost and speed increase, with each attack restoring 4 health points.
advancement.if.heat.burning_v2.name: Blazing Explosion
advancement.if.heat.burning_v2.descripti: Causes an explosion when attacked, dealing 80%% damage reduction for 1 second. The explosion increases Soultemp (15) and causes damage to living beings (including yourself). There's a 10%% chance to trigger an explosion upon attacking (immune to self).
advancement.if.heat.cold_v0.name: Chilling
advancement.if.heat.cold_v1.name: Frostscale
advancement.if.heat.cold_v1.description: Slightly slows down, increases defense (4 armor points), steals Soultemp from opponents and slows them down when attacked, and generates Frost on the spot.
advancement.if.heat.cold_v2.name: Iceblight
advancement.if.heat.cold_v2.description: Slightly slows down, slightly lowers opponent's defense with each attack (3 points per attack, max 15 points) and steals Soultemp, generating Frost on the spot.
advancement.if.heat.frozen_v0.name: Freeze
advancement.if.heat.frozen_v0.descriptio: Freezes oneself (unable to move or attack) until attacked, gains Soultemp, or freezes for more than 10 seconds. Unfreezing through methods other than gaining Soultemp triggers Shatter Ice, causing massive damage and restoring 40%% Soultemp.
advancement.if.heat.frozen_v1.name: Piercing Cold
advancement.if.heat.frozen_v1.descriptio: Deals 2 hp damage to oneself with each attack. The lower the health, the higher your damage and defense (under 50%% health, +1 damage, +1 armor; under 30%%, +2 damage, +3 armor; under 10%%, +4 damage, +6 armor). If health falls below 10 hp, attacks have a chance to trigger an ice storm, standing still for 1 second will grant 5 seconds of Regeneration III.
advancement.if.heat.frost.name: Frost
advancement.if.heat.frost.description: Picking up temporarily removes the slow effect and slightly decreases Soultemp.
advancement.if.enchantment.root.name: Enchantment Log
advancement.if.enchantment.root.descript: Your notes on the enchantments produced by this factory.
advancement.if.tips.root.name: Tips
advancement.if.tips.root.description: Some helpful tips about this factory.
advancement.if.tips.changer.name: Temperature Changer
advancement.if.tips.changer.description: Activates periodically to spew Flame or ice, changing the surrounding temperature.
advancement.if.tips.aa_armor.name: Alchemy Suit
advancement.if.tips.aa_armor.description: A suit crafted by noble Alchemists from enchanted fibers, offering powerful blessings. (Can be repaired with enchantment books)
advancement.if.tips.guardian_armor.name: Guard Suit
advancement.if.tips.guardian_armor.descr: Crafted from high-quality steel, this is the standard armor for guards, sturdy and reliable. (Can be repaired with iron ingots)
advancement.if.tips.magma_armor.name: Flame Suit
advancement.if.tips.magma_armor.descript: Armor worn by fire demons, covered in blazing flames. (Can be repaired with magma blocks)
advancement.if.tips.frozen_armor.name: Frozen Suit
advancement.if.tips.frozen_armor.descrip: Ice crust formed on undead in the cold zone, incredibly hard, perfect for armor. (Can be repaired with blue ice)
advancement.if.tips.vault.name: Magic Vault
advancement.if.tips.vault.description: A vault storing countless treasures, willing to trade with you for diamonds, but what you get is uncertain.
text.cyan.check_advancement_tip:
%s - %s
Tip: Press %s to view features of this area!
